snippet: A homeless man was arrested and charged with arson after a fire destroyed a building at an Islamic institute in Houston, fire officials said Monday.
abstract: Houston fire officials announce arrest of homeless man Darryl Ferguson, who has been charged with arson for fire that destroyed building at the Quba Islamic Institute.
lead_paragraph: A homeless man was arrested and charged with arson after a fire destroyed a building at an Islamic institute in Houston, fire officials said Monday.

headline.main: Texas: Arrest Made in Islamic Center Fire
headline.print_headline: Texas: Arrest Made in Islamic Center Fire
